ygData.subject: RE: Jar Recipes
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t seem to find the small jar in my potter s book. (Did I miss it?) It also seems extremely odd to me that a SMALL jar would need TWO bocks of clay. (2
ygData.messageBody:
I can't seem to find the small jar in my potter's book. (Did I miss it?) It
also seems extremely odd to me that a SMALL jar would need TWO bocks of
clay. (2 small blocks of clay or one block of clay seem more likely to me)

I recommend checking the recipe.

Here is my jar recipe which I have confirmed (got me my first 40 skill
points in pottery)

Fashioining a Clay Jar:
A block of clay
appropriate jar sketch
flask of store bought water

Firing a Clay Jar
unfinished jar
quality firing sheet

Graedon
Ranger of Surefall Glade
Master Potter
Master Brewer

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Buvala [mailto:sean@...]
Sent: Saturday, July 10, 1999 12:53 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com; EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Jar Recipes


From: Sean Buvala <sean@...>

Help. I have tried the following recipe, which others tell me works for
them.
What am I doing wrong? I get the "these items do not combine in these
quaintities" message


2 blocks of clay
1 small jar sketch
1 water flask

no luck. Anyone know what I am doing wrong?

Thanks

Sean
<http://www.storyteller.net/amphitheater>http://www.storyteller.net/amphithe
ater
